data.name: msgAutomaticColorText
data.value: Automatic|A message for a ToolStrip color selection drop down text for automatic.

data.name: msgCardFileSaveChangesQuery
data.value: The card file {0} has changed. Save the changes?|A query from the user whether to save the changed card file.

data.name: msgCardFileSaveChangesQueryTitle
data.value: Save changes to the card file?|A title for a dialog asking whether to save changed card file.

data.name: msgCardTypeDefaultCanNotDelete
data.value: The default card can not be deleted. Please set another card as default and then remove the selected one.|A message describing that the default card type can not be removed and another type should be set to default before removing the selected one.

data.name: msgCardTypeDefaultCanNotDeleteTitle
data.value: The default card can not be deleted|A title of a dialog explaining to the user that the default card type can not be removed.

data.name: msgCardTypeDescription
data.value: Card type:|A description text for a card type selection combo box.

data.name: msgCardTypeMustHaveDefault
data.value: A default card type must be set!|A message indicating that a default card type must be set.

data.name: msgCardTypeNameTitle
data.value: Card type name|A title for a dialog requesting a user to enter a name for a card type

data.name: msgCardTypeNameUniqueError
data.value: The card type name must be unique and can not be an empty string!|A message indicating that the name of the card type must be unique compared to other card types. Also the card type name can not be an empty string.

data.name: msgCardTypeOneRequired
data.value: At least one card type is required|A message explaining to the user that at least one type for a card is requires within a card file

data.name: msgCardTypeOneRequiredTitle
data.value: One card type is required|A title of a dialog explaining to the user that at least one type for a card is requires within a card file

data.name: msgCardTypeSelectTypeNewTitle
data.value: Select a new card type|A dialog title message instructing the user to select a new card type.

data.name: msgCartTypeSelectTypeNewForDeleted
data.value: Select a new card type for the cards with the deleted type of: {0}|A message instructing the user to select a new card type for the cards using a card type about to be deleted.

data.name: msgConfirmAPassword
data.value: Confirm the password to protect the card file.|A user is asked for a confirmation for a password in a dialog (the second time)

data.name: msgConfirmAPasswordTitle
data.value: Confirm the password|A user is asked for a confirmation for a password in a dialog (the second time)

data.name: msgCopy
data.value: Copy|A message for a menu item indicating a copy function.

data.name: msgCut
data.value: Cut|A message for a menu item indicating a cut function.

data.name: msgDialogConfirmTitle
data.value: Confirm|A title for a dialog confirming something from the user.

data.name: msgDialogImageFileFilter
data.value: Image files|*.jpg;*.jpeg;*.png;*.bmp;*.gif;*.tiff|A filter for a file dialog to open image files.

data.name: msgDialogImageFileOpenTitle
data.value: Open image file|A title for a dialog asking the user to open an image file.

data.name: msgDialogRtfFileExportTitle
data.value: Export as Rtf file|A dialog title to export the card contents to a RTF file.

data.name: msgDialogRtfFileFilterExport
data.value: Rtf files|*.rtf|A filter for a file dialog to save RTF files.

data.name: msgDialogRtfFileFilterImport
data.value: Rtf files|*.rtf|Text files|*.txt|Any file|*.*|A filter for a file dialog to open RTF files.

data.name: msgDialogRtfFileImportTitle
data.value: Import Rtf file|A dialog title to import a RTF file to the card contents.

data.name: msgEditorCardCreated
data.value: Created: {0}|A message for a status strip to indicate a date and time the card was created.

data.name: msgEditorCardModified
data.value: Modified: {0}|A message for a status strip to indicate a date and time the card was modified.

data.name: msgEncryptionGiveAPassword
data.value: The file is encrypted, please give a password.|A message indicating file encryption. A password is requested from the user.

data.name: msgEnterCardTypeName
data.value: Enter a name for the card type|A message instructing the user to give a name for a new card type

data.name: msgEnterPassword
data.value: Give a password|A message querying a password from the user with the card file protection

data.name: msgEnterPasswordConfirm
data.value: Confirm the password|A message querying a password confirmation from the user with the card file protection

data.value: Alphabetical|A localized enumeration value for card sort style of: Alphabetical.

data.value: Modified|A localized enumeration value for card sort style of: Modified.

data.name: msgEnumSortNone
data.value: None|A localized enumeration value for card sort style of: None.

data.name: msgError
data.value: Error|A message describing that some kind of error occurred.

data.value: Give a password|A user is asked for a password in a dialog

data.name: msgInvalidPassword

data.value: New {0}|A text for a new file name or a new card file internal name.

data.value: CARD TYPE|A default name for a type of a card in a new card file.

data.name: msgNewCardTypeName
data.value: New card type|A localized default name for a new card type

data.name: msgPasswordInvalid
data.value: The given password is invalid. Please try again.|The user-given password is invalid so do complain via a dialog

data.value: Invalid password|The user-given password is invalid so do complain via a dialog title

data.name: msgPasswordMisMach
data.value: The entered passwords mismatch. Please try again.|The user entered two different passwords so an error message is displayed.

data.value: The given passwords mismatch. Please try again.|The user-given password are different so do complain via a dialog

data.name: msgPasswordMismatchTitle
data.value: Password mismatch|The user-given password are different so do complain via a dialog title

data.name: msgPasswordRequired
data.value: Password is required|A short message indicating that some operation requires a valid password for the some operation to continue successfully.

data.value: Paste|A message for a menu item indicating a paste function.

data.name: msgPasteWithoutFormatting
data.value: Paste without formatting|A message for a menu item indicating a paste without formatting function.

data.name: msgPrintPreview
data.value: Print preview|A message for a print preview window title

data.value: Search:|A text for a label near a search text box.
